author: brett
msg: [CONTINUUM-2603] [CVE-2010-3449] CSRF vulnerability - Continuum doesn't check which form sends credentials

author: danhaywood
msg: yet another update to Isis' Keys, changing email and comment in line with advice in http://www.apache.org/dev/release-signing.html#key-id

author: mikemccand
msg: make MockRandomMergePolicy slightly less evil; fixes 2 recent test failures

author: veithen
msg: Eliminated two deprecation warnings emitted by maven-plugin-plugin.

author: rhuijben
msg: Handle "/./" and "/%2E/" in the same way while canonicalizing urls. Before
this patch the first was handled as a no-op segment, while the second was
handled as a segment containing just a dot.
(test_uri_canonicalize): Add a few tests on noop segments.
(test_uri_is_canonical): Add two test cases on noop segments.
Found by: Noorul Islam K M <noorul{_AT_}collab.net>
